snippet: Some visitors to the National September 11 Memorial Museum described its treatment of Islam and terrorism as “clinical” and “light” and said they thought a Muslim might feel uncomfortable visiting.
abstract: Some visitors to National September 11 Memorial Museum say seven-minute video installation devoted to explaining Al Qaeda and terrorism provides them with basic information about Islam and Al Qaeda; many say it is not enough explanation to enrich their perspective, and others believe Muslims might feel uncomfortable visiting.
lead_paragraph: Some visitors to the National September 11 Memorial Museum described its treatment of Islam and terrorism as “clinical” and “light” and said they thought a Muslim might feel uncomfortable visiting.

headline.main: Visitors Fault Sept. 11 Museum’s Portrayal of Islam
headline.print_headline: Faulting Portrayal of Islam at Museum
